entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 10:28 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 97.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: ENE 35 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then southwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
